Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.interfaces.io

Interface Writable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FileService, WritableResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseWritableResource, BitArrayResource, File, NullResource, OutputResource, ZipEntry
    public interface Writable
    Interface to something that can potentially be opened for writing.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isWritable()  
      java.io.OutputStream onOpenForWriting()
      Opens the output stream to this writable
      default java.io.OutputStream openForWriting()
      Opens something that can be written to, returning an output stream.
      default java.io.OutputStream openForWriting​(ProgressReporter reporter)
      Opens something that can be written to, returning an output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • isWritable

        boolean isWritable()
        Returns:
        True if this write-openable object can be written to

      • onOpenForWriting

        java.io.OutputStream onOpenForWriting()
        Opens the output stream to this writable

      • openForWriting

        default java.io.OutputStream openForWriting()
        Opens something that can be written to, returning an output stream.
        Returns:
        The output stream to write to

      • openForWriting

        default java.io.OutputStream openForWriting​(ProgressReporter reporter)
        Opens something that can be written to, returning an output stream. The given progress reporter is called for each byte that is written to the output stream. The caller may wish to initialize the progress reporter with the number of bytes it plans to write via ProgressReporter.steps(Count) to allow the reporter to report the percent complete as the stream is written.
        Parameters:
        reporter - A progress reporter that is called for each byte that is written
        Returns:
        The output stream to write to
